queries.query: -- claim jobs update `{prefix}Jobs` set row_id = (@row_id := row_id), claimed_by = @claimed_by, invisible_until = @invisible_until, attempt = attempt + 1 where status = 0 and invisible_until <= @now and scheduled_for <= @now order by invisible_until limit 1; select row_id, job_id, payload, attempt from `{prefix}Jobs` where row_id = @row_id;
-- keep job claim update `{prefix}Jobs` set invisible_until = @invisible_until where row_id = @row_id and claimed_by = @claimed_by
-- complete job update `{prefix}Jobs` set claimed_by = null, invisible_until = @max_date, status = 1 where row_id = @row_id and claimed_by = @claimed_by
-- forget job update `{prefix}Jobs` set claimed_by = null, invisible_until = @max_date, status = 2 where row_id = @row_id and claimed_by = @claimed_by
-- retry job update `{prefix}Jobs` set claimed_by = null, invisible_until = @invisible_until where row_id = @row_id and claimed_by = @claimed_by
-- clean old jobs delete from `{prefix}Jobs` where status > 0 and invisible_until >= @max_date and scheduled_for < @cutoff_date limit 100
